meanings.sent1: The larvicidal spray effectively eliminated the mosquito larvae in the pond.
meanings.sent2: The larvicidal properties of the chemical helped control the insect population.
meanings.sent3: The larvicidal treatment turned the stagnant water into a no-fly zone for mosquitoes.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as larvicidal to obstacles as the strongest pesticide.
meanings.sent5: The larvicidal effect of the solution was immediate and noticeable.

meanings.sent1: The pond was treated with a powerful larvicidal to combat the mosquito infestation.
meanings.sent2: The farmers used larvicidal to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent3: The jar of larvicidal on the shelf looked like a potion from a magical story.
meanings.sent4: The larvicidal acted like a guardian, protecting the plants from destructive pests.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of the larvicidal was evident in the reduced larvae population.
